citation: Environmental Management and Pollution Control (Noise) Amendment Regulations 2021 (Tas)
text:
Environmental Management and Pollution Control (Noise) Amendment Regulations 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Environmental Management and Pollution Control Act 1994 .

9 August 2021

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

R. C. JAENSCH

Minister for Environment

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Environmental Management and Pollution Control (Noise) Amendment Regulations 2021 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on the day on which their making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Regulations
    In these regulations, the Environmental Management and Pollution Control (Noise) Regulations 2016 are referred to as the Principal Regulations.

4.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Environmental Management and Pollution Control (Noise) Regulations 2016 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 18 August 2021

These regulations are administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
